QuestData.Title: Mission: Culling The Vermin
QuestData.Description: I was sent to this valley to protect The Heartland from any potential threats.$B$BI've identified a high priority target. The Springtail vermin burrow into the mountain cliffs, high above the farmlands.$B$BLeft unchecked, their numbers will multiply, and they will make their way down to the fields below.$B$BThey must be eliminated.
